name: Rose Gold Stud Earrings
short_description: Delicate and dazzling, perfect for everyday elegance.
description: Delicate and dazzling, these rose gold studs are perfect for everyday elegance. Crafted with premium materials and a flawless finish, they add a subtle sparkle to any look.

name: Crystal Drop Earrings
short_description: Make a statement with brilliant crystal drops.
description: Make a statement with our crystal drop earrings. Designed to catch the light and turn heads, these earrings are ideal for special occasions or a glamorous night out.

name: Minimalist Hoop Earrings
short_description: Classic hoops for a timeless look.
description: Classic hoops designed for effortless style. Lightweight and versatile, they complement both ethnic and western outfits.

name: Gold Plated Jhumkas (Diwali Special)
description: Traditional gold plated jhumkas crafted to elevate your festive outfits. Lightweight comfort with standout sparkle.
